scripts.compile-scss: node-sass --include-path scss src/scss/main.scss dist/css/pixl.css && npm run beautify-css && npm run minify-css
scripts.build-css: mustache -p views/partials/header.mustache -p views/partials/footer.mustache data/css/css-data.json views/templates/pageTemplate.mustache > dist/pages/css.html
scripts.build-node: mustache -p views/partials/header.mustache -p views/partials/footer.mustache data/node/node-data.json views/templates/pageTemplate.mustache > dist/pages/node.html
scripts.build-npm: mustache -p views/partials/header.mustache -p views/partials/footer.mustache data/node/npm-data.json views/templates/pageTemplate.mustache > dist/pages/npm.html
